title: Adobe Fontfinder not quite there
content:
My guess is that [http://www.adobe.com/type/fontfinder/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116121504/http:/www.adobe.com/type/fontfinder/ "http://www.adobe.com/type/fontfinder/") needs some more work:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100116121504im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontfinderscreen_6032.gif)

(Shadow? Body text? Hah!)

Bert Vanderveen BNO
author: bert_vanderveen
